dataTemplate.name: NVO_JOBS_CANCELLED_SEVEN_DAYS
dataTemplate.description: NVO Jobs Cancelled in Last Seven Days

dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT DISTINCT j.job_xid job_id, j.move_perspective_gid job_type, j.attribute2 booking_no, oref.order_release_refnum_value loc_code, j.attribute17 shipper, j.attribute18 consignee, j.attribute19 start_loc, j.attribute20 end_loc, j.attribute1 carrier, REPLACE(j.insert_user,'SCOULAR/NVO.','') ops_manager, REPLACE(js.update_user,'SCOULAR/NVO.','') cancelled_by, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(from_tz(CAST(js.update_date AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central', 'MM/DD/YY'),'MM-DD-YY') cancel_date, TO_CHAR(from_tz(CAST(js.update_date AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central', 'MM/DD/YYYY HH:MI PM') cancelled_date FROM job j INNER JOIN job_status js ON j.job_gid = js.job_gid AND js.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.JOB_CANCELLED' AND js.status_value_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.JOB_CANCELLED' LEFT OUTER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN order_release_refnum oref ON jorj.order_release_gid = oref.order_release_gid AND oref.order_release_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' WHERE TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(from_tz(CAST(js.update_date AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central', 'MM/DD/YY'),'MM-DD-YY') >= TO_DATE(SYSDATE - 7,'DD-MM-RR') ORDER BY TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(from_tz(CAST(js.update_date AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central', 'MM/DD/YY'),'MM-DD-YY') DESC
